name: Through the Dark (R_Goulart)
description:
Game made for NOKIA 3300 JAM#4 

In this exploration game, you must choose your adventurer and destroy the big crystals to receive the key that opens the boss door.

With the money acquired in the level, you will be able to buy upgrades and items that will help you on your journey.

(obs: The game has some bugs, but I'll work on them after Jam).

CONTROLS:

  • Move: W ,A ,S ,D
  • Attack/Confirm: SPACE
  • Pause/Menu: P
